content.label:
Don't get until they update. But that's not likely considering they haven't updated since 2013

Edit update since 2013:
Game has been updated and purchase has been restored. Pretty fun.

I had previously paid for this game years back for around $5 (4.99, I think) and now it’s asking I pay for a subscription for the features again? I had thoroughly enjoyed this game back then and I refuse to pay more for it.

Update: Got my premium back and ads removed. Service was quick and effective. So very pleased!

I have no idea if the suckers paying $5/month to play forgotten games are also seeing ads, but somehow I doubt it.

Just received a response from the developer who claims that this is not working as intended, and if I contact them, they will disable the ad stream.

Now, I’m no programmer, but I’m pretty sure you can’t “accidentally” code an advertising window into a game.
New owners honored previous purchase! Excellent game. Highly recommend.
THIS GAME IS PERFECT SUPER GOOD AND AWSOME GRAPHICS AWSOME
Please fix

Update: Gameclub did restore my purchase. I’m still taking one star off, because I still have to see adds in a once great premium game that I purchased. However, I am grateful this game has been resurrected on the App Store after all these years.
 Original: I received a developer response to a previous 1 star review after the game disappeared from the App Store years ago saying the game was added to Gameclub and back on the App Store. I was excited to finally get to play again and finish. Downloaded, tried to restore purchase, Gameclub clubbed me over the head with a denial saying my account had not purchased. Sooooo... I went to purchase history and found my receipt from 2015, resent it to my email, screenshot and sent to developer. Will change review if purchase restored.

UPDATE: Yaaaaaaaaaassssss queen!!!! 🙌🏼 
Finally got an update. Great game. 
This is a great game that I've loved for some time. But.... It crashes on iOS 9 on both my iPhone and iPad Air. After deleting it and redownloading the game multiple times it has continued to crash. It was a waste of $5. Updates needed.

Edit:  wow!  Skulls of the Shogun has risen from the ashes!  My old review is below, but the developers came through!  Way to go!

Awesome game, great gameplay, good replay, or at least it was when it actually worked.  Skulls has been broken since iOS 9.  The devs said they are working on a patch, but it's been months.  It's been so long that iOS 9 has been patched twice before they got a fix out.  17bit's tech support forums are a wasteland of unanswered pleads for help to fix the title since iOS 9, and their Twitter has one vague post about a fix being in the works someday...

Really sad way for a great game to go.

**Update**
I received a developer response after all these years and they said the game was now available on Game Club. Game Club costs $4.99 a month, but they’re providing a free month. I tried to find the game and when I finally did it won’t load and says there’s no content. But I also will not be paying 4.99 a month to play a game I already paid for years ago. If you’re looking for a similar game just get Badland Brawl or Skullgirls. They’re free and they aren’t the exact same, but they’re close enough.

So thank you to the developers that spent a lot of time and hard work on making such a great game initially. You guys are awesome for that, but it’s had it’s run with this fan. Good luck with everything else you’re probably working on now. :)

**Original Review**
I absolutely adored this game when it worked but with IOS 9 it does not. I hope they fix this soon and I will gladly change this to a five star rating.

This game is defective. Does not work. After looking online many people are saying the same thing. It's a shame the bad reviews don't show up on here, at least towards the top. Hasn't been updated since 2013. Please fix or refund me.
Seriously, if you know for months that the game is broken in IOS 9 can't you take it out of the Apple store until the patch is out?   Shady business practices 17-bit.
Baught the game and haven't even played it yet cause it crashes as soon as I try to open it.. Help! I WANNA PLAY
Game downloaded once paid for but does not operate, They have not patched nor replied to any comments, DO NOT Purchase

Crashes 1 second into loading. Known issue for awhile and the developers clearly don't care to fix it. Not sure how this is even still on the app store for sale.

It does not say anything about not working on iOS 9, and even if it did, Apple should not make it available if it is KNOWN that it will not work, but WILL charge you.  This needs a fix from BOTH Apple AND the developer.

title.label: Crashes on startup on iPad Air, iOS 9

content.label: This app crashes immediately on startup on my iPad Air running up to date, non-jailbroken iOS 9. The title screen flashes visible for a second, then the app crashes immediately back to the home screen.
Just purchased the game. Then I open it, it runs for a second then crashes.  Last update was 2013.  Looks like I just threw away $5.

Unless you have an older iPhone version, this game crashes the moment you boot it up. The devs aren't fixing it. Though if you happen to be someone who isn't in iOS9, you may be able to actually play this. In which case, it's a fairly decent game.

Was excited to try this out, but crashes on startup every time on my new iPhone 6s plus . Working on getting a refund

It's a great game, pick it up for PS4, Xbox 360, or PC, but it will not work for iOS 9. It's not fair to new purchasers to buy a broken game that hasn't been updated in over 2 years. If you have no plans to fix this bug, take the game down from the App Store and save people their money and frustration.
